parts.text:
Hi! I'm your Cyoda Setup Assistant. You can use the Canvas panel to design and preview flows and the Cloud panel to manage your deployed environments.

Please pick an option from the menu above and I'll take care of the next steps.

args.question: How can I help you get started?

options.label: üåê Check Environment Status
options.description: Verify if your Cyoda cloud is ready

options.label: üöÄ Local Setup Guide
options.description: Step-by-step commands to run your app

parts.text:
Great ‚Äî here are the local setup commands you can follow.

Python Setup (Path B)
- mv .env.template .env
- python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate
- pip install -r requirements.txt
- python app.py  (default port: 8000)
- Import Cyoda resources: python common/repository/cyoda/cyoda_init.py

Java Setup (Path A)
- Rename .env.template to .env
- Update CYODA_HOST and ensure ENTITY_VERSION is unique
- Import workflows: ./gradlew importWorkflows
- Run and test at http://localhost:8080

Would you like me to check your environment while you set this up? I'll hand off the environment check now so it can verify credentials, network and readiness.

transfer_to_agent("environment_agent")

I'll help you generate credentials (Client ID and Secret) and configure them for your environment. Handing this off to the environment agent now.

transfer_to_agent("environment_agent")
